languages.text: {n}Молодой Зауэрбэк втирается следующим, решительно отодвигая Гапрака.{/n} "Ваша Светлость, род Зауэрбэков предчувствует наступление неспокойных и кровавых времен. Дабы богопротивные ксеносы познали ужас при вашем приближении, мое семейство смиренно подносит вам дюжину орудий вспомогательного калибра для вашего корабля".

traits.locale_text: {n}Молодой Зауэрбек втирается следующим, решительно отодвигая Гапрака.{/n} "Ваша милость, род Зауэрбеков предчувствует наступление неспокойных и кровавых времен. Дабы богопротивные ксеносы познали ужас при вашем приближении, мое семейство смиренно подносит вам дюжину орудий вспомогательного калибра для вашего корабля".
traits.speaker: YoungZaurback

languages.text: {n}Young Sauerback squeezes through to be the next, pushing Gaprak aside with confidence.{/n} "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, House Sauerback anticipates the onset of unsettled and bloody times. To make the ungodly xenos cower at your approach, my family humbly presents you with a dozen pieces of secondary armament for your ship."
languages.original_text: {n}Молодой Зауэрбэк втирается следующим, решительно отодвигая Гапрака.{/n} "Ваша Светлость, род Зауэрбэков предчувствует наступление неспокойных и кровавых времен. To make the ungodly xenos cower at your approach, my family humbly presents you with a dozen secondary caliber weapons for your ship."

To make the ungodly xenos cower at your approach, my family humbly presents you with a dozen pieces of secondary armament for your ship."

languages.text: {n}ヤング・ザウアーバックが自信満々にギャプラックを押しのけて隣に割り込む。{/n}「陛下、ザウアーバック家は不安と流血の時代がやってくると予想しております。陛下が近づけば邪悪な異種族が萎縮するように、我が一族は陛下の船の予備兵装1ダースを謹んでお贈りします」
languages.original_text: {n}Young Sauerback squeezes through to be the next, pushing Gaprak aside with confidence.{/n} "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, House Sauerback anticipates the onset of unsettled and bloody times. To make the ungodly xenos cower at your approach, my family humbly presents you with a dozen pieces of secondary armament for your ship."

traits.locale_text: {n}ヤング・ザウアーバックが自信満々にギャプラックを押しのけて隣に割り込む。{/n}「陛下、ザウアーバック家は不安と流血の時代がやってくると予想しております。陛下が近づけば邪悪な異種族が萎縮するように、我が一族は陛下の船の予備兵装1ダースを謹んでお贈りします」
traits.speaker: YoungZaurback

languages.text: {n}年轻的苏尔贝克充满信心地将贾帕克挤到一边，成为下一个发言的人。{/n}“大人，苏尔贝克家族预感到，动荡而血腥的时代即将来临。为了让那些邪恶的异形对您的到来望而却步，我们家族特意为您的战舰准备了各种各样的副武器。”
languages.original_text: {n}Young Sauerback squeezes through to be the next, pushing Gaprak aside with confidence.{/n} "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, House Sauerback anticipates the onset of unsettled and bloody times. To make the ungodly xenos cower at your approach, my family humbly presents you with a dozen pieces of secondary armament for your ship."

traits.locale_text: {n}年轻的苏尔贝克充满信心地将贾帕克挤到一边，成为下一个发言的人。{/n}“大人，苏尔贝克家族预感到，动荡而血腥的时代即将来临。为了让那些邪恶的异形对您的到来望而却步，我们家族特意为您的战舰准备了各种各样的副武器。”
traits.speaker: YoungZaurback

languages.text: {n}El joven Sauerback se abre paso para ser el siguiente, apartando a Gaprak con un empujón.{/n} «Mi{mf|lord|lady}, la casa Sauerback cree que se avecinan tiempos inquietos y sangrientos. Para que los impíos xenos tiemblen al aproximarse, mi familia le entrega una docena de armas secundarias para su nave».
languages.original_text: {n}Young Sauerback squeezes through to be the next, pushing Gaprak aside with confidence.{/n} "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, House Sauerback anticipates the onset of unsettled and bloody times. To make the ungodly xenos cower at your approach, my family humbly presents you with a dozen pieces of secondary armament for your ship."

traits.locale_text: {n}El joven Sauerback se abre paso para ser el siguiente, apartando a Gaprak con un empujón.{/n} «Mi{mf|lord|lady}, la casa Sauerback cree que se avecinan tiempos inquietos y sangrientos. Para que los impíos xenos tiemblen al aproximarse, mi familia le entrega una docena de armas secundarias para su nave».
traits.speaker: YoungZaurback

languages.text: {n}Le jeune Sauerback ne se gêne pas pour écarter Gaprak afin de s'assurer d'être le suivant à vous présenter ses hommages.{/n} « Votre Seigneurie, la maison Sauerback n'est pas aveugle aux conflits sanglants qui s'annoncent. Ma famille vous offre une dizaine de pièces d'armement secondaire pour votre vaisseau, de quoi insuffler la terreur chez les misérables xénos qui croiseront votre route. »
languages.original_text: {n}Young Sauerback squeezes through to be the next, pushing Gaprak aside with confidence.{/n} "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, House Sauerback anticipates the onset of unsettled and bloody times. To make the ungodly xenos cower at your approach, my family humbly presents you with a dozen pieces of secondary armament for your ship."

traits.locale_text: {n}Le jeune Sauerback ne se gêne pas pour écarter Gaprak afin de s'assurer d'être le suivant à vous présenter ses hommages.{/n} « Votre Seigneurie, la maison Sauerback n'est pas aveugle aux conflits sanglants qui s'annoncent. Ma famille vous offre une dizaine de pièces d'armement secondaire pour votre vaisseau, de quoi insuffler la terreur chez les misérables xénos qui croiseront votre route. »
traits.speaker: YoungZaurback

languages.text: {n}Der junge Sauerback drängelt sich vor, um der Nächste zu sein, und schiebt Gaprak selbstbewusst zur Seite.{/n} "Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}, das Haus Sauerback erwartet unruhige und blutige Zeiten. Damit die gottlosen Xenos in die Knie gehen, wenn Ihr Euch nähert, übergibt Euch meine Familie demütig ein Dutzend Sekundärwaffen für Euer Schiff."
languages.original_text: {n}Young Sauerback squeezes through to be the next, pushing Gaprak aside with confidence.{/n} "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, House Sauerback anticipates the onset of unsettled and bloody times. To make the ungodly xenos cower at your approach, my family humbly presents you with a dozen pieces of secondary armament for your ship."

traits.locale_text: {n}Der junge Sauerback drängelt sich vor, um der Nächste zu sein, und schiebt Gaprak selbstbewusst zur Seite.{/n} "Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}, das Haus Sauerback erwartet unruhige und blutige Zeiten. Damit die gottlosen Xenos in die Knie gehen, wenn Ihr Euch nähert, übergibt Euch meine Familie demütig ein Dutzend Sekundärwaffen für Euer Schiff."
traits.speaker: YoungZaurback

languages.text: {n}Aradan sıyrılan genç Sauerback, Gaprak'ı öz güvenle kenara iterek tebrik eden ikinci isim oluyor.{/n} {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri, Sauerback Hanesi olarak tedirgin ve kanlı bir döneme girmek üzere olduğumuzu sezmekteyiz. Siz yaklaştıkça dinsiz zenolar ürksün isteriz. O yüzden ailemin size naçizane bir armağanı olarak geminiz için bir düzine ikincil bataryayı lütfen kabul edin."
languages.original_text: {n}Young Sauerback squeezes through to be the next, pushing Gaprak aside with confidence.{/n} "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, House Sauerback anticipates the onset of unsettled and bloody times. To make the ungodly xenos cower at your approach, my family humbly presents you with a dozen pieces of secondary armament for your ship."

traits.locale_text: {n}Genç Sauerback, tebrik edecek ikinci kişi olmak için öz güvenle Gaprak'ı sıkıştıra sıkıştıra bir kenara itiyor.{/n} {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri, Sauerback Hanesi olarak tedirgin ve kanlı bir dönemin başlayacağını sezmekteyiz. Siz yaklaştıkça dinsiz zenolar ürksün isteriz. O yüzden ailemin size naçizane bir armağanı olarak geminiz için bir düzine ikincil bataryayı lütfen kabul edin."
traits.speaker: YoungZaurback
